title: 10 year gift
body: I got the riot kayle skin, but not the icon. Do they come separately or did I just lose out on a good icon?

replies.body: As Lew suggesting, gifts are rolling out individually so you may not get everything all at once.  Since there's a lot of accounts to gift it may take some time, so bookmark our [support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) for updates.  Let me know if you have any questions!
They are coming out one by one and you should get everything by 9/23.
